EmailTemplate.name: 202006_APAC_Airlines_APU-I_Webinar_ON24.202006_APAC_C&PS_Opt-in Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you missing out on important customer service updates?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Thank you for your interest in our Airline Operators Webinar Series. We hope you found these webinars to be informative and interesting. We look forward for your suggestions and inputs to make our future events more relevant to you.
In case you were unable to attend, or could only attend partially, you may contact your Customer Support Manager for slides that were presented in the webinar. They will be happy to assist you.
Besides these webinars, we are creating some great content designed to help you learn how to fly more safely and with greater efficiency. We are in constant touch with our customers on product updates, upgrade offers, event schedules, informative content and so much more, but if you have not subscribed to our emails, you are missing all of this. It’s therefore important that you opt-in <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to ensure you are kept up-to-date with all of our latest news. SUBSCRIBE NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> Once again we thank you and trust we continue to enjoy your patronage.
We look forward to staying connected.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Team
